title: Players Unable to Connect
body:
The past few days that I have played summoner's rift/draft pick, there is always at least one person that is unable to connect.

I personally, have experienced the issue. I was in the loading screen, waiting for another player to load as I already had hit 100%.
It was stuck there for about 5-10 minutes before I decided to alt+tab to do something else while I waited.

Only when I did this, did LoL state that I had been disconnected. I had been disconnected without my knowledge this whole time. The game had started without me and I was extremely behind.

I am uncertain what you did with your last few patches, but you are breaking a significant amount of things.

replies.body:
Hi Brotos!

It is usually very uncommon to have an issue where the Loading Screen simply sits at 100%, while the game starts playing normally.  I would be really interested in figuring out how this happened, so we can prevent it in the future.  To that end, can you find the R3d log (game logs) of this particular game and reply back and attach it?  You can find out how to find these [R3d Logs in this article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7).
Not quite sure which ones it is, as it only says 21 days ago so I'm assuming it was on the 26th or the 27th

Same problem here. Last night I was at 100%, a teammates avatar hadn't even loaded, and 2 enemies were stuck around 50%. After a while I killed the game and reconnected. I got in but disconnected within seconds, tried for ~15 minutes. Got the dumb warning about leaving when I logged on today. First game, froze during load. I actually got into the game but I was already 3 levels behind. An enemy had the same issue and got in much later.
